specialEffects.name: Omni-Guard & Guard Damage Reduction
specialEffects.desc:
Able to guard against attacks from all
directions. Damage Reduction UP by 20%
when guarding.

specialEffects.name: Skill Cooldown on Perfect Guard
specialEffects.desc: Increases cooldown speed of all Advanced Skills by 30% upon a Perfect Guard.

specialEffects.name: Attack On Dash
specialEffects.desc: Deals damage to surrounding enemies when dashing.

specialEffects.name: Guaranteed Critical on Perfect Dodge
specialEffects.desc: All attacks are guaranteed critical for a time after a successful Perfect Dodge.

specialEffects.name: Extend Combo Opening Time
specialEffects.desc: Increases the combo counter's opening time by 100%.
